Package org.apache.wayang.core.platform

Class ExecutorTemplate

java.lang.Object
org.apache.wayang.core.util.AbstractReferenceCountable
org.apache.wayang.core.platform.ExecutorTemplate
All Implemented Interfaces:
CompositeExecutionResource, ExecutionResource, Executor, ReferenceCountable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenericJdbcExecutor, GiraphExecutor, JdbcExecutor, PushExecutorTemplate, TensorflowExecutor
public abstract class ExecutorTemplate extends AbstractReferenceCountable implements Executor
Implements the ExecutionResource handling as defined by Executor.

    • registerMeasuredCardinalities

      protected void registerMeasuredCardinalities(Collection<ChannelInstance> producedChannelInstances)
      Select the produced ChannelInstances that are marked for instrumentation and register them if they contain a measured cardinality.
      Parameters:
      producedChannelInstances - the ChannelInstances

    • registerMeasuredCardinality

      protected void registerMeasuredCardinality(ChannelInstance channelInstance)
      If the given ChannelInstance has a measured cardinality, then register this cardinality in the crossPlatformExecutor with the corresponding Channel and all its siblings.
      Parameters:
      channelInstance - the said ChannelInstance

    • createPartialExecution

      protected PartialExecution createPartialExecution(Collection<ExecutionLineageNode> executionLineageNodes, long executionDuration)
      Create a PartialExecution according to the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      executionLineageNodes - ExecutionLineageNodes reflecting what has been executed
      executionDuration - the measured execution duration in milliseconds
      Returns:
      the PartialExecution or null if nothing has been executed
